text: Here and Now and Sounding Good! was the sixth Dick Morrissey Quartet recording. It was released in 1966. The tracks included were a tribute to Dick Morrissey's friends and fellow British jazz musicians. == Track listing == # "Off the Wagon" (Tubby Hayes) # "Corpus" (Ian Hamer) # "Don't Fall Over the Bridge" (Tubby Hayes) # "Sunday Lunch" (Dick Morrissey) # "Little Miss Sadly" (Stan Tracey) # "El Schtuck" (Harry South) == Personnel == *Dick Morrissey - tenor sax *Harry South - piano *Phil Bates - double bass *Bill Eyden - drums == See also == *Dick Morrissey discography Category:1966 albums Category:Dick Morrissey albums Category:Mercury Records albums
title: Here and Now and Sounding Good!
